about_the_game:
In the strange world, players will play astronauts who travel to another parallel space, returning to the ancient world of martial arts and exploring a civilization that is highly similar to ancient China. High freedom and open world is the main melody, players need to survive from the other world to survive in their own way, in this different world or practice martial arts hegemony, or start the clan to become a generation of masters, or play magic to winAll corners of the country enmity or children affection enmity, all by you will open up!

The game features
1. 3D realistic role-playing + simulated operation + survival + martial arts themed games;
2, open the world, you may become a generation of lean, can become a businessman set up shop in business, or independent factions set their fighting skill challenge other factions, can become hostile or friendly relations with NPC decided to develop in the future, more can encounter female NPC happened a relationship become lovers, of course you could go back to reality;
3. The eight living states (hunger, mood, moisture, temperature, weight bearing, excretion, energy and health) will affect the role gain or loss, and each state is linked with the other;
4, pets (cats, dogs) for you to protect the home or accompany you to explore;
5. Unique riding system allows you to gallop around the world in the later period;
6. Challenge the schools (tianji daoge, magic dragon school, zizhu mountain resort, taixu sword school, xisong school, eight wild gods school, etc.) to become a strange warrior.
7, biaoju can let you build biaoju darts can also let you rob darts.

Game system introduction
1. Simulated operation: collect various materials for building articles, plant vegetables, breed cattle and sheep, build houses, operate and rent shops for trading; 2, survival: gathering wild fruit to satisfy hunger, fishing, cooking food and so on in this world need to solve your eating and drinking lazar, of course, rotten food will let you produce diarrhea;
3, martial arts: independent school original own martial arts, can also challenge other school;
4, weather and day and night: will let you produce cold vertigo and a series of states, the night will let you meet a tough opponent, perhaps is the Wolf perhaps is the bandit, 12 hours you want to master;
5, title: let you add a variety of gain effect;
6, friends, enemies: friends can help you in the daily, the enemy will kill you in the daily;
7, random: copy map and events are random, you may kill a monster in any day to produce random events to change your future
8;Small games: remember those small games that allowed you to play for a few minutes in your free time? Fishing, mining, etc;
9: weapons, equipment: knives, swords, hidden weapons, bows and arrows, sticks, leather, iron, stone and other Chinese elements are indispensable;
10, couples: you can find female NPCS in the world by meeting each other and finally falling in love;
11, yamen: in this world crime can be arrested fast and even arrest the head chase;
12, home: sometimes it may be a rogue rogue occupation, you need to protect your home with your beloved dog at any time;
13. Post: the quickest way to ride a horse to another place;
14, experience distribution: no grades, can experience learning skills to improve proficiency;
15, recruitment: can recruit a guard or ding to guard you or your home;
16: mission: the main task to take you to grow, branch or random mission to let you get normally unable to obtain items;
17, archives: must sleep archives, later will sleep in the inn, of course, sleep in the tent may die in his sleep;18, event records: you died in a certain day a certain hour will be recorded, convenient to record your death number, of course, also avoid you died in the same death method.
More game highlights and game system will be gradually disclosed, of course, you have good Suggestions can also enter the group to put forward.
